name: 某月某夜
content: And his lips they were sad and tight
And his heart was heavy this night
He's riding and hiding his pain
And watched as he passed her way
At the sight of the stallion
But cast greedy eyes on the bay
Meant more to him than life
Had ridden when she was his wife
He's riding and hiding his pain
And looked up the stranger there
And he gave her some money
He just didn't seem to care
They had no time to warn her
He's riding and hiding his pain
The stranger went free of course
For you can't hang a man
Who's trying to steal your horse
And if he should pass your way
And don't lay a hand on the bay
He's riding and hiding his pain
That`s when you think it`s all over
